cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.oj.action

Class BaseAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.oj.action.BaseAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserDAOAware, IActionInterceptor, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ApplicationAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.RequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArticleAction, ArticleAdminAction, ArticleStatementAdminAction, ContestAction, ContestAdminAction, ContestListAction, ContestRankListAction, ContestStatementAdminAction, ContestStatusAction, ExcelExportAction, FileUploadAction, IndexAction, IndexAction, IndexAction, LoginAction, LogoutAction, ProblemAction, ProblemAdminAction, ProblemListAction, ProblemStatementAdminAction, RegisterAction, RegisterAction, StatusAction, StatusAdminAction, SubmitAction, TestAction, TestFileUploadAction, TrainingContestAction, TrainingContestAdminAction, TrainingIndexAction, TrainingUserAction, TrainingUserAdminAction, UserActivateAction, UserAdminAction, UserCenterAction, UserListAction

    public class BaseAction
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements org.apache.struts2.interceptor.RequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ApplicationAware, IActionInterceptor, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, UserDAOAware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Base action support, add specified common elements in here.
    Author:
    fish
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getActionURL

        String getActionURL(String namespace,
                  String name,
                  String parameterString)
        Get action url by namespace, action name and parameter.

        Example getActionURL("/problem","page","/1") return acm.uestc.edu.cn/problem/page/1 getActionURL("/problem","page","?id=1") return acm.uestc.edu.cn/problem/page?id=1

        Parameters:
        namespace - action's namespace
        name - action name
        parameterString - parameter list for action
        Returns:
        action url

      • buildPageInfo

        protected PageInfo buildPageInfo(Long count,
                     Long countPerPage,
                     String baseURL,
                     Integer displayDistance)
        Build a page html content according to number of records, records per page, base URL and display distance.

        Example: Get total and set it into buildPageInfo method:
        PageInfo pageInfo = buildPageInfo(articleDAO.count(), RECORD_PER_PAGE, getContextPath("") + "/Problem", null);

        Parameters:
        count - total number of records
        countPerPage - number of records per page
        baseURL - base URL
        displayDistance - display distance for page numbers
        Returns:
        return a PageInfo object and put the HTML content into request attribute list.

        protected void out(String content)
